title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the synchronization process fails.
EB: The synchronization process should be successful when attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open the package viewer. 2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) simultaneously in the package viewer.
